definitions.definition: A localized accumulation of pus in the skin, resulting from infection .

main_definition: A localized accumulation of pus in the skin, resulting from infection .

definitions.definition: The point at which fluid begins to change to a vapour ; the boiling point .
examples: Add the noodles when the water comes to the boil .
Surface water will do, but give it a good boil before drinking it.

definitions.definition: A dish of boiled food, especially seafood.
examples: a down-home boil with plenty of crab

definitions.definition: A social event at which people gather to boil and eat food, especially seafood. ( Compare a bake or clambake . )
examples: a down-home boil at the town hall

definitions.definition: The collective noun for a group of hawks .

main_definition: The point at which fluid begins to change to a vapour ; the boiling point .
secondary_definitions: A dish of boiled food, especially seafood.
( US ) A social event at which people gather to boil and eat food, especially seafood. ( Compare a bake or clambake . )
( rare , nonstandard ) The collective noun for a group of hawks .
